author: potuz
content: Just as a one-man statistics (but consistent with my last count on the whole network on bad head votes) in my node, out of the last 6600 attestations (that's 12 days here) I have 86 bad head votes, 30 of which are on slot 0. That accounts currently to 1,12% of earnings. My last count on bad head votes on mainnet was about this so I suspect all are losing this much.
